# **Journal**

This journal includes the use of many Machine Learning concepts and techniques in different problem sectors written in `R`. You may visit each topic individually by clicking on the corresponding link below or by selecting from the drop-down menu above. Within each page, you will see a detailed markdown highlighting the process, code, and results.

This is part of the Institute of Entrepreneurship within the Hamburg University of Technology where `R` is learned and implemented for business analytics. Code is hosted in a private repository in GitHub.
